story: Would you like to explore the city?
The trails are busy. You've never seen anything like this. Monstrous figures pass in a blur, their growls are loud and eyes are glowing.

You made it to calm space in between the towering mountains that surround you. The rumble of the monsters recedes into the background. Your stomach is growling... You haven't eaten for days. You notice some rats feeding on scraps. Fixated on your prey, you...
choices: Play it slow, sneak up behind the dumpster.

story: You press forward on high alert. What is that beautiful light in the distance... You leap for your life, narrowly avoiding what seemed like sure death. The monster roared on, as if it did not even notice you. Lucky to have avoied the monster's gaze, you creep through the shadows to a narrow opening nearby.
The paltry rodents scurry away before you come within a paws length. They take their scraps with them and you are left alone in the dark, hungry for the night...

You sneak through the rough terrain, slowly creeping towards your prey. You wait for just the right moment and leap for your first chance of nourishment in days. The furry creatures scamper away, leaving their meager scraps behind. The taste of rot will be enough to hold you over.
There is a girl. Let her pet you?
You let her pet you? Get smacked with a broom
Found a pie... Eat the pie? It's okay.. try it... No... must resist... Maybe??? SMELLS SCRUMPTIOUS!!! come on.. you know you want to...
choices: thats gonna be a no from me dawg

story: NOM NOM MUNCH MUNCH YUMMY FREAKIN PIE!!!!!

choices: I trust the hooman, He smells like me

story: I found the edge... looks kinda high up... maybe if i jump to the next building i can get down easily
You look around and theres an easy way down right in front of you the whole time.
jumped and missed... ouch... at least you landed in a dumpster that cushioned the fall

idk if i trust him but desparation so ima snug. he takes you in and makes you cozy. see? happy ending after all.

story: Wow, this place is pretty. No scary monsters over here.
Wait, what is that? It's so dark but I think I see something over there. HELLOOOOO, I come in peace!
